# Default path auto-init without --db or --config
exec ugh add Default path task
stdout 'Default path task'

exec ugh list
stdout 'Default path task'

exec ugh config show
stdout 'version = 1'
stdout '\[db\]'
stdout 'path = "'

exec ugh config get db.path
stdout 'ugh.sqlite'

[darwin] exec sh -c 'test -f "$HOME/Library/Application Support/ugh/config.toml"'
[darwin] exec sh -c 'test -f "$HOME/Library/Application Support/ugh/ugh.sqlite"'

[!darwin] exec sh -c 'test -f "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ugh/config.toml"'
[!darwin] exec sh -c 'test -f "$XDG_DATA_HOME/ugh/ugh.sqlite"'
